entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
